author: bnicholes
msg: Don't repeatedly allocate the binddn and bindpw from the st->pool (pconf pool) in order to avoid uncontrolled memory allocations.

author: wrowe
msg: Bump to 1.3.30, add the Notice.txt and cleanly split read from the
read_src components (read_src containing the original filenames
for reinvoking nmake -f Makefile.win installr.)  The read component
offers windows-friendly files (.txt's) for the license, notice, etc.

author: joes
msg: Mark missing-CRLF issue in mfd code.  Simplify semantics for apreq_param & apreq_upload by reading POST data until desired key is found. Also simplify one of the env test modules by checking for EOS in last bucket instead of checking all buckets.
